name: Second Try
description:
This is a top-down COD zombies style shooter where players must balance their progression through the map towards a killable enemy base with the amount of upgrades/defense systems they have. Don't unlock too much of the map too soon otherwise you may just get swarmed!

This is my first ever game project (but second attempt hence the name). I am currently working on a Fallout-Shelter-esque game for the NoticeMe game jam hosted by Pewdiepie.
